data.message: Thank you Facebook!!!!!!! An awesome way to stay in contact with family and friends, thanks again!!!!!

replies.message: You're welcome, Silvia! Thank you for being part of our community. Happy Friends Day! -Rhea

Joanie Scaduto Pizzonia is right! After my hacking (which I followed you help rules) my whole Facebook is messed up and it truly messed up my whole account and you don't help fix things I have learned as well!!

Hi, Joanie. We want people to understand how Facebook works so they can take charge of their experience. That's why we created Privacy Basics, a resource with tips and interactive guides for managing your information on Facebook. Check it out: http://bit.ly/2kbJg85. -Rhea

Hello! My FB p.c. version has switched over night to the new 'messenger' version of viewing the messages. I do not want this version, as many of the functions have disappeared, and I think this new 'messenger' version on p.c. is useless for me. Can you please assist in switching back to the old p.c. version of viewing the messages!? Thank you in advance for your time and support.
